Package org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PropertyBox  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControlFactory
    A class to create Control objects for the Package Tool GUI.
    DatePropertyBox  
    DisciplinePropertyBox
    Widget for displaying combo boxes for selecting disciplines to add to an artifact.
    EmptyFieldButtonDisableListener
    Simple listener that keeps track of Strings if any of the fields are empty it disables a button, once all fields have values it reenables the button.
    NumericPropertyBox  
    NumericTextField
    Class that extends TextField but only allow numeric values to be entered.
    PackageToolPopup
    A helper class that creates a popup with a uniform look for the entire application.
    ProfilePropertyBox  
    ProgressDialogPopup
    A popup that includes a progress dialog.
    PropertyValidationListener
    Simple String property listener that validates the string field on change, and displays the correct information in the provided labels.
    RemovableLabel
    Custom widget that has a label with a trash icon within a parent vbox that is passed in so that these values can be added to or removed from that vbox.
    SimplePropertyChangeListener
    Class used to capture changes to simple properties, provides ability to determine if any fields are empty.
    TextPropertyBox
    A text widget with a label and text input control, with possibility of adding validation to the text property The VBox is necessary because validation adds an additional Label element above the HBox temporarily, informing the user of a problem with the entry while it is invalid.
    UserDefinedPropertyBox
    Creates a VBox that contains the controls for defining a user defined property.
    ValidationAwareEventHandler
    This class is a validation aware event handler for our multiple field UI element.
    WarningPopup
    A popup that has a warning message for the user with confirm and cancel actions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ControlType
    An enum of types of Control objects that we create in the ControlFactory
